file_content.text: Item has been successfully modified!
Modification of this type is already present!
You are not high enough level to use this modification!
Modification of this type doesn't fit this item!
No available modification slot found!
An error has occured while trying to modify this item!
This is not a valid modification item!
The item modification station is too far!
You do not meet the alignment requirements to use this modification!
You do not meet the social score requirements to use this modification!
This modification is already present!
You do not meet the valor requirements to use this modification!
You have insufficient credits to extract this modification!
This modification is restricted to a specific piece of equipment and is not valid for target item!
This augment requires a more powerful augment slot!
Your Warzone Rank isn't high enough to use this modification!
This item cannot be modified!
You do not meet the entitlement requirements to use this modification!
You are unable to remove enhancements from items.
You don't have the subscription permission required to add this modification to the item.
You don't have the subscription permission required to change this item's modifications.
You don't have the subscription permission required to add augment slots to this item.

Addition of a modification to this equipment will remove the previous Authorization from the modification. The modification will not be useable until you acquire a permanent Authorization from the Cartel Market.

You do not have Authorization for the modification you are adding to this equipment. Adding this modification will remove the previous Authorization from the equipment. The equipment will not be useable until you acquire a permanent Authorization from the Cartel Market.
You do not meet the reputation requirements to use this modification!
The modification is attempting to change slot restriction of item that is equipped in different slot.
